name: They Call Me Rump
description:
They Call Me Rump

A "realistic" custody battle simulator where the player controls a hot shot lawyer trying to achieve custody of the first born child of a straw spinner for Rumpelstiltskin following the fairy tale story.

Can you beat the legal system that's stacked against you?

2nd Place in Hat Jam 7, a weekend game jam hosted by VFS Game Design Alumni
